Welcome, and Thank You for installing TubeBuddy!
Step 1
Subscribe to our channel in order to stay informed of our latest Tools, Tips & Tricks
Step 2
Watch our Getting Started video below.
Popular Tools & Features
Keyword Explorer
The ultimate keyword research tool for YouTube. Uncover what people are searching for on YouTube, rank higher in search results, get relevant video topic ideas and ultimately drive more views to your videos.
Launch Keyword Explorer Now
Click Magnet (Preview!)
Quickly identify what content your audience is craving and learn what style of thumbnails will drive the most clicks.
Launch Click Magnet Now
Thumbnail Generator
Create professional quality thumbnails using still frames from your video with text and image layers added on top.
Go to the My Videos Page Now
Click TB Menu next to video,
select "Thumbnail Generator"
Health Report
Get an overall look at the health and performance of your channel.
View Health Report Now
Video A/B Testing
Discover which Thumbnails, Titles, Tags & Descriptions drive the most clicks and views to your videos. Test. Optimize. Improve.
Create A/B Test Now
Bulk Processing
Update hundreds or even thousands of videos in a snap with TubeBuddy's bulk processing tools. (Update Cards, End Screens, Thumbnails, Descriptions and more!)
Go to the My Videos Page Now
Click the Bulk menu above list of videos
COPPA Center
Scan your channel and discover which videos YouTube has rated 'Made for Kids' (and which ones it hasn't).
Launch COPPA Center
Comment Moderation
Reply faster using pre-made Canned Responses.
Go to the Comments Page Now
Best Practice Checks
100% automated Best Practice Checks will ensure that each of your videos are following YouTube's guidelines.
Go to the My Videos Page Now
Click the Edit button next to the video
Videolytics
Access advanced analytics and insights, instantly for any YouTube video. See how your own videos are performing or track your competitors.
Go to any Video Watch Page Now
